nodes.text: The Baby Ewoks' Picnic Surprise is a 1984 children's book written by Melinda Luke and illustrated by Pat Paris. It was published by Random House.

Wicket and Kneesaa babysit Nippet and Wiley and decide to take them fishing and have a picnic. The woklings get into mischief and discover rainbow berries which the Ewoks use to make rainbow berry pies for their Harvest Moon Feast.
